title: Can we get more alternate titles for champions?
body:
Something that came to mind after reading the Lissandra short story. At the end, she's referred to as "the Lady of Ice and Darkness", which is a pretty good title that references several fantasy figures simultaneously.

What I'm asking for is, can we get more alternate, in lore titles for champions? They're famous figures, after all. Like calling Azir "the Great Eagle of the Vast Desert", or Mordekaiser "the Tyrant-Sorcerer of the East" to sell the feeling of the word "champion".
